Search-filter

The search filter allows the user to refine the search results for a specific query.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-search-filter

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-search-filter

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-search-filter/src/scss/search-filter";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Search filter

Add a group of form fields for each section. Optionally provide an intro text for the search filter.

Verfijn uw zoekopdracht

Gegevens

Locatie

Salaris
Zoekopdracht verwijderen 
      
  <div class="vl-search-filter">
    <p class="vl-search-filter__intro">Verfijn uw zoekopdracht</p>
    <form class="vl-search-filter__form" action="">
      <section class="vl-search-filter__section">
        <h2 class="vl-search-filter__section-title">Gegevens</h2><div class="vl-search-filter__field">
            <label class="vl-form__label vl-search-filter__field__label" for="firstname">Voornaam</label>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="firstname"
    name="firstname"
    value=""/>
          </div><div class="vl-search-filter__field">
            <label class="vl-form__label vl-search-filter__field__label" for="name">Naam</label>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="name"
    name="name"
    value=""/>
          </div>
      </section>
      <section class="vl-search-filter__section">
        <h2 class="vl-search-filter__section-title">Locatie</h2><div class="vl-search-filter__field">
            <label for="vl-select-city"
    class="vl-form__label vl-search-filter__field__label">Stad</label>
  <select name="vl-select-default"
    id="vl-select-city"
    class="vl-select--block vl-select vl-select--block"
    tabindex="0"  data-vl-select-deletable >
              <option placeholder>Kies een stad</option><option value="">Brussel</option><option value="">Gent</option>
            </select>
          </div><div class="vl-search-filter__field">
            <label for="vl-select-country"
    class="vl-form__label vl-search-filter__field__label">Land</label>
  <select name="vl-select-default"
    id="vl-select-country"
    class="vl-select--block vl-select vl-select--block"
    tabindex="0"  data-vl-select-deletable >
              <option placeholder>Kies een land</option><option value="">België</option>
            </select>
          </div>
      </section>
      <fieldset class="vl-search-filter__field">
        <legend class="vl-search-filter__field__label">Salaris</legend>
        <div class="vl-range" data-vl-range>
    <div class="vl-range__from-label">
      <label for="from" class="vl-range__input-label">Van</label>
      <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--small js-vl-range__from-input"
        type="number"
        id="from"
        name="from"
        value="0"
        pattern="[0-9]*">
    </div>
    <div class="vl-range__to-label">
      <label for="to" class="vl-range__input-label">Tot</label>
      <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--small js-vl-range__to-input"
        type="number"
        id="to"
        name="to"
        value="999"
        pattern="[0-9]*">
    </div>
    <div class="vl-range__slider js-vl-range__slider">
      <div class="vl-range__slider-range js-vl-range__slider-range"></div>
        <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat js-vl-range__from-handle vl-range__handle vl-range__handle-from"
          role="slider"
          tabindex="0"
          aria-valuemin="0"
          aria-valuenow="0"
          aria-valuetext="0"
          aria-valuemax="999"
          aria-label="Minimumwaarde"></i>
        <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-left-fat js-vl-range__to-handle vl-range__handle vl-range__handle-to"
          role="slider"
          tabindex="0"
          aria-valuemin="0"
          aria-valuenow="999"
          aria-valuetext="999"
          aria-valuemax="999"
          aria-label="Maximumwaarde"></i>
    </div>
  </div>
      </fieldset>
      <div class="vl-search-filter__field">
        <button class="vl-button"type="submit">
    Zoeken
  </button>
      </div>
    </form>
    <div class="vl-search-filter__footer">
      <a href="#" class="vl-link">Zoekopdracht verwijderen</a>
    </div>
  </div>

Search filter alternative background

Apply vl-search-filter--alt class modifier to make the background color white.

Verfijn uw zoekopdracht

Gegevens

Locatie

Salaris
Zoekopdracht verwijderen 
      
  <div class="vl-search-filter vl-search-filter--alt">
    <p class="vl-search-filter__intro">Verfijn uw zoekopdracht</p>
    <form class="vl-search-filter__form" action="">

          aria-valuetext="0"

          aria-label="Minimumwaarde"></i>

          aria-valuenow="999"
          aria-valuetext="999"
          aria-valuemax="999"
          aria-label="Maximumwaarde"></i>

    Zoeken

      </div>
